name: EPISODIC DEMO
description: The Episodic game is presented in black-and-white tones, using lighting, ambient sounds to create an eerie atmosphere often associated with the horror genre. The player controls the boy throughout the game. As is typical of most two-dimensional platform games, the boy can run left or right, jump, climb onto short ledges or up and down ladders and ropes, and push or pull objects. full game story based on Episodic memory is defined as the ability to recall and mentally re-experience specific episodes from one's personal past and is contrasted with semantic.
